title: At the Black Gate II
author: VD
content_html: Today’s post at Black Gate might seem a bit bizarre to some of the readers there unfamiliar with my approach to life, the universe, and everything, but I doubt anyone here will be surprised to learn that I’m interested in the possibility that mass psychology may not only be able to explain thematic vogues, but genre preferences as well.
content_text:
Today’s post
at Black Gate might seem a bit bizarre to some of the readers there unfamiliar with my approach to life, the universe, and everything, but I doubt anyone here will be surprised to learn that I’m interested in the possibility that mass psychology may not only be able to explain thematic vogues, but genre preferences as well.
